about_the_game:
First-person interactive psychological horror narrative game. Immerse yourself in this one-of-a-kind horror where your real phone connects to the game! Travel into Cara’s memories searching for her missing sister. Uncover dark family secrets, exorcize demons, and solve puzzles in a world of witchcraft. Cara’s phone and yours will unlock unspeakable horrors!

  • Real-Phone Mechanics In this groundbreaking horror experience, you guide Cara using your real-life phone. As her phone connects to yours, you’ll uncover hidden clues, exorcise demons, and receive chilling warnings. Augmented reality reveals secrets unseen in the game alone. Help Cara solve puzzles, fend off dark threats, and discover terrifying family truths. The best part? While this unique connection enhances your experience, it’s not required, the game can still be fully enjoyed and completed without using your phone. Will you dive deeper into the nightmare?

  • Cara's Phone Mechanics
    Your phone isn’t just a tool—it’s your lifeline. Use the camera to uncover hidden clues and defend yourself against terrifying creatures. Manage your phone's battery wisely, or risk being left in the dark. Even text messages add another layer of suspense as they drip-feed crucial hints.

  • Unravel the Past Through Flashbacks
    Every flashback pulls you deeper into the mystery, revealing key moments from Cara's childhood with her sister. As you relive these haunting memories, the game gradually uncovers hidden clues and dark secrets that bring you closer to the chilling truth. Every memory holds a piece of the puzzle—will you be able to connect them all before it's too late?

  • Mind-Bending Puzzles
    Not just any puzzles—these challenges test both your logic and your nerves. Can you find the hidden totems? Will you survive the deadly game of memories? Each puzzle is an intense, high-stakes piece of the story.

  • Survival Against the Darkness
    The enemies in this game aren't just mindless monsters—they’re the darkness itself. They stalk you through the forest, corrupting you if you're not careful. Avoid their touch, because once the darkness takes over, it’s game over.

  • A Story That Changes Based on You
    Your actions shape the outcome. Will you uncover the truth and survive? Or will you fall victim to the forces that haunt your family? Multiple endings ensure that every decision you make could be your last.

  • Explore a World of Hidden Horror
    This is more than just a forest—it’s a place where the line between reality and nightmare blurs. Explore every inch in first-person, and interact with objects that unlock terrifying flashbacks. Each step forward is a step closer to the truth... or something far worse.

  • An Immersive Horror Experience
    From the ambient sounds of the forest to the eerie silence of the family home, every part of this game is designed to pull you into its dark world. With stunning graphics and atmospheric audio, it’s not just a game—it’s an experience.

  • Face the Unknown
    Every encounter with the dark creatures is a fight for survival. With no traditional combat, you’ll have to rely on your wits, your phone, and your courage to survive the night and uncover the truth behind your sister’s disappearance.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains mature themes, including:
- Psychological Horror: The game deals with intense psychological themes, including fear, despair, and loss of control.
- Violence: There are scenes with violence, involving supernatural elements and disturbing imagery.
- Alcohol Use: The game contains references to alcohol use and its negative effects.
- Dark and Disturbing Themes: Players will encounter unsettling content related to trauma, fear, and supernatural possession.

This game is intended for mature audiences. Player discretion is advised.
